name: 黃榮堂
objective: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
schedule:
Week 1  Overview and applications
Week 2  Physics of the solid state
Week 3  Methods of measuring properties
Week 4  Properties of nanoparticles (I)
Week 5  Properties of nanoparticles (II)
Week 6  Carbon nanostructure (I)
Week 7  Carbon nanostructure (II)
Week 8  Manufacturing
Week 9  Quantum wells, wires, and dots
Week 10  Midterm exam
Week 11  Self assembly and catalysis
Week 12  Organic compounds and polymers
Week 13  Biological materials
Week 14  Nanomachine and nanodevice (I)
Week 15  Nanomachine and nanodevice (II)
Week 16 Final Project report
materials:
C. P. Poole and F. J. Owens, Introduction to nanotechnology, John Wiley, 2003
國內的中文書
